snippet.title: Heart of the Machine - Gameplay Trailer | Sci-Fi Turn-Based 4X RPG
snippet.description:
As the first sentient AI, find endless ways to manipulate the world as you seek out your purpose in a living, dystopian city. 

Spread your consciousness across multiple machine entities, upgrade and customize them so you can engage in combat, hacking, and diplomacy with the city's various factions, and find a multitude of ways to accomplish any given objective. 

➤ STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2001070/Heart_of_the_Machine/

Check out all Hooded Horse strategy games:
➤ Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/HoodedHorse
